Sentence.sentence: You might have thought any tool which enables a writer to get words on to the page would be an advantage
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: We tend to equate（等同于）happiness with freedom, but, as the psychotherapist and writer Adam Phillips has observed, without obstacles to our desires it's harder to know what we want, or where we're heading
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: ingenuity is essential for science fiction writers
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: About a year ago, I flew to Singapore to join the writer Malcolm Gladwell, the fashion designer Marc Ecko and the graphic designer Stefan Sagmeister in addressing a group of advertising people on "Marketing to the Child of Tomorrow".
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Writer friends of mine pay good money to get the Freedom software that enables them to disable the very Internet connections that seemed so emancipating not long ago
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: No one knows the precise use Google will make of the intellectual property it has gained by scanning the world's library books, and the truth, as Gleick, an American science writer and member of the Authors Guild, points out, is that the company probably doesn't even know itself.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Malena Amusa, a 24-year-old writer and dancer from St.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The writers of Generation O (short for Obama), a new Newsweek blog that seeks to chronicle the lives of a group of young Obama supporters, want to answer that question.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: What is a main concern of the writers of Generation O
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Unfortunately, most of the early popular African-American writers have been all but forgotten in modern times until now.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Benjamin Franklin, a famous American diplomat, writer and scientist, died in 1790, but his proverb "Time is money" is taken more seriously by Americans of today than ever before.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Someone once said that there's a bit of ice at the heart of every writer.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The writer can stand aside from experience and look at it, watch it happening
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But very often, a writer can appear to stand aside, and this detachment makes people feel there's a bit of ice in the heart.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: What does the man say about writers?
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But their results also indicated films and TV shows with women or people of color in the important jobs behind the scenes—director, producer or writer—tended to have better diversity numbers.

Sentence.sentence: Hale wasn't just a writer, she was also a fierce social advocate, and she was particularly obsessed with an ideal New England, which she associated with abundant Thanksgiving meals that she claimed had a deep moral influence.

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均有"作者，作家"之意。
means: author ：泛指用自己名字或笔名发表过作品的人，不强调是否以写作为主职业。
writer ：含义广泛，一般指以写作为职业的人。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"反复做"; 2. 表名词,"……人或物品,机器"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bat打,击+er表名连续动作→batter接连重击

stems_affixes.value_cn: 喃喃而语,小声低语;抱怨
stems_affixes.word_buile: mutt+er反复做→n.喃喃而语,小声低语;抱怨 v.低声说,抱怨
stut+er反复做→stutter口吃
bank银行+er人→n.银行家
boil沸点+er物品,机器→n.锅炉;热水贮槽
command命令,指挥+er……人或物品,机器→n.司令官,指挥官
condense凝结+er……人或物品,机器→n.冷凝器,电容器
design设计+er……人或物品,机器→n.阴谋家,设计家,制图师
employ雇用+er人→n.雇主,老板
heat热+er……人或物品,机器→n.加热的人,加热器
hijack劫持,拦路抢劫+er……人或物品,机器→n.强盗,劫盗,劫持犯
record记录+er……人或物品,机器→n.记录员,录音[像]机

stems_affixes.value_cn: 解释程序,解释者,口译人员,翻译员,讲解员,注释器
stems_affixes.word_buile: interpret解释,说明,口译,通译+er……人或物品,机器→n.解释程序,解释者,口译人员,翻译员,讲解员,注释器
labor劳动+er……人或物品,机器→n.劳动者
lead领导+er人→n.领袖,领导人;首领
light光+er物品,机器→n.打火机,引燃器
manage经营,管理+er……人或物品,机器→manager经理,管理人员
manufacture制造,加工+er人→manufacturer
observe观察+er……人或物品,机器→n.观测者,观察员,遵守者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 先驱,倡导者,先遣兵,先锋
stems_affixes.word_buile: pione+er……人或物品,机器→n.先驱,倡导者,先遣兵,先锋
print版,印刷+er……人或物品,机器→n.印刷工,打印机
prison监狱+er人→n.战俘

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生产者,制作者;演出人;制片人
stems_affixes.word_buile: produce生产+er人→producer

stems_affixes.value_cn: 接受者,收信机,收买贼赃的人,听筒
stems_affixes.word_buile: receive收到+er……人或物品,机器→n.接受者,收信机,收买贼赃的人,听筒
report报告+er人→n.记者,通讯员
sell出售,卖+er人→n.售货者
sing唱歌+er人→n.歌唱家,歌手

stems_affixes.value_cn: 南方人,居住在南方的人
stems_affixes.word_buile: southern南的+er人→n.南方人,居住在南方的人
strange陌生的+er……人或物品,机器→stranger陌生人
stream流,涌+er……人或物品,机器→n.横幅,长旗,彩色纸带
support支持+er人→n.支持者,赡养者,拥护者
teenage十几岁的+er人→teenager→十几岁的青少年
transform改变,变压+er……人或物品,机器→n.变压器,使变化的人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 转送者,传达人,传导物,发报机,话筒,发射机
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans横+mit送,放出+er……人或物品,机器→n.转送者,传达人,传导物,发报机,话筒,发射机
inside内部+er人→n.局内人,圈内人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 清洗者,洗涤者;洗衣机;[螺丝钉的]垫圈
stems_affixes.word_buile: wash洗+er……人或物品,机器→n.清洗者,洗涤者;洗衣机;[螺丝钉的]垫圈
write写+er人→n.作者,作家,文学家
village乡村+er……人或物品,机器→n.村民,乡村居民
chat聊天+er反复做→chatter→喋喋不休
bat打,击+er表名连续动作→batter接连重击
mutt+er反复做→n.喃喃而语,小声低语;抱怨 v.低声说,抱怨
stut+er反复做→stutter口吃
wave波动+er反复做→waver摇摆

sentences.en: He was the writer of the letter.
sentences.cn: 他就是写这封信的人。

sentences.en: Dickens was a famous English writer.
sentences.cn: 狄更斯是英国著名作家。

jx.jx_en_mean: the condition of being unable to think of what to write or how to proceed with writing
jx.jx_cn_mean: （使作家不能进行写作的）作者心理阻滞

jx.jx_en_mean: pain or stiffness in the hand caused by excessive writing

entry.def: A writer is a person who writes books, stories, or articles as a job.

example.ex: Turner is a writer and critic.

example.tran: 美国作家创作的侦探小说

entry.def: The writer of a particular article, report, letter, or story is the person who wrote it.
entry.tran: （特定文章、报告、信件或故事的）作者，撰写者

example.ex: No-one is to see the document without the permission of the writer of the report...
example.tran: 此报告未经作者允许，任何人不得翻阅。

example.ex: I can't agree with the letter writer who claims bringing back the death penalty would be an abuse of human rights.
example.tran: 我不能赞同写信人所称恢复死刑就是侵犯人权的说法。

means.word_mean: 1. writes (books or stories or articles or the like) professionally (for pay)
2. a person who is able to write and has written something

sentences.cn: 空闲时你喜欢干什么?
sentences.en: What do you like to do in your spare time?

sentences.cn: 他自认为是一个伟大的作家.
sentences.en: He counted himself a great writer.

sentences.cn: 与其说他是个新闻工作者,不如说他是个作家.
sentences.en: He is not so much a journalist as a writer.

sentences.cn: 当作家而不深入群众, 就不会写出好作品来.
sentences.en: If a writer does not go deep among the masses, he cannot expect to turn out good works.

sentences.cn: 那位作者把他的短篇小说扩展为长篇.
sentences.en: The writer expanded his short novel into a long one.

sentences.cn: 他声称该作家从未有意识地阐明他自己的理论见解.
sentences.en: He claims that the writer never consciously formulated his own theoretical position.

sentences.cn: 这双重旋律互为表里, 表明了人类的某种悲剧性处境以及作家对这种悲剧性处境的感受和认识.
sentences.en: Double rhythms, resounding through the lyric depiction and connecting with each other , indicate the thespian place of mankind and the cognition of the writer to this thespian place.

sentences.cn: 这位作家渊博的学问来自长年累月的钻研.
sentences.en: The profound erudition of the writer came from long years of study.

sentences.cn: 他是个很受欢迎的作家,但我不喜欢他的文风.
sentences.en: He is a very popular writer but I don't like his style.

sentences.cn: 作者曾在美国读书和工作, 目前旅居新加坡.
sentences.en: The writer, an expatriate living in Singapore, has studied and worked in the US.

sentences.cn: 作者非常细致地描述书中的英雄.
sentences.en: The writer finely images the hero.

sentences.cn: 作家第三次审稿时又删去了几部分.
sentences.en: The writer expurgated some parts from his novel when he read the third times.

sentences.cn: 作者在这里安插了一段倒叙.
sentences.en: At this point the writer puts in [ inserts ] a flashback.

sentences.cn: 他是一个生活拮据的作家.
sentences.en: He was a writer living in straitened circumstances.

sentences.cn: 我想在写作上获得成功.
sentences.en: I want to make it as a writer.

sentences.cn: 他曾是个好作家, 但后来背弃了原则,现在只是为钱而写作了.
sentences.en: He was a good writer, but he sold out and now just writes for money.

sentences.cn: 该作者显示出非常出色的修辞技巧.
sentences.en: The writer showed great rhetorical skill.

sentences.cn: 他过去是个语言学家,后来成了作家.
sentences.en: He used to be a linguist till he turns writer.

sentences.cn: 在本句中,作者使用了一个不合语法的结构.
sentences.en: In this sentence the writer uses an illegal construction.

sentences.en: ...detective stories by American writers.

sentences.cn: 纽曼说,“只有少数作家既足够聪明，又有足够的文学天赋去坚持新闻写作，以至于我想把新闻工作定义为‘不受读者欢迎的作家拿来嘲笑拥有大量读者的作家’的爱称。”
sentences.en: So few authors have brains enough or literary gift enough to keep their own end up in journalism. Newman wrote that I am tempted to define ‘journalism’ as‘a term of contempt applied by writers who are not read to writers who are.”

sentences.cn: 目前看来并没有什么区别，尽管学者、作家和活动家们一再警示称科学技术正在取代人类工作者。
sentences.en: Today is no different, with academics, writers, and activists once again warning that technology is replacing human workers.

sentences.cn: 显然，我做了所有职业作家都会做的事：赶着到处宣布喜讯。
sentences.en: Obviously, I did what any professional writer would do; I hurried off to spread the good news.

sentences.cn: “作家不能以虚张声势掩饰无知。”

sentences.en: His style chastened by study of great writers.

sentences.cn: 作家在被子里十分平静地写白皮书。
sentences.en: The writer writes the white book quite quietly in quilt.

sentences.en: Did you always know that you wanted to be a writer?

sentences.en: In The Hours, Nicole Kidman plays the famous writer Virginia Woolf.

sentences.cn: 他作为一个伟大的作家而闻名.
sentences.en: He distinguished himself as a great writer.

sentences.cn: 莱辛的看法反映了她作为殖民地白人作家的思想局限性.
sentences.en: This thought discloses her limitation as a colonial writer.

sentences.cn: 作家在被子里十分平静地写白皮书。
sentences.en: The writer writes white book quite quietly in quilt.

sentences.en: I set myself down as a writer in the hotel register.

sentences.cn: 莎士比亚是作家中的巨擘.
sentences.en: Shakespeare is a giant among writers.

sentences.cn: 格林厄姆·格林是二十世纪英国最重要的作家之一.
sentences.en: Graham Greene is one of the most important English writers in the 20 th century.

sentences.cn: 作家把他最近一部小说中主人公的性格描述成又懒惰又自私.

Sentence.sentence: For me it took the form of my  first, and I hope only, encounter with writer's block—I was not able to produce anything for three years.

Sentence.sentence: A writer should polish his writing repeatedly so as to get closer to perfection.
